long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All new PointsBet customers can claim a bonus of 50% up to $500 after registering with a PointsBet promo code. Apart from this bonus, the operator has other promotions available. We mention here the $200 cashback for every ESPN NBA game and the Protest Payout.
How can I use the PointsBet promo code?
Taking advantage of the benefits that the PointsBet promo code can get you are limitless.

To be able to enjoy them though, players must follow these steps:

Click on the red button above,
Complete the registration process by filling in the form with their personal (required) details,
Enter the PointsBet promo code in the designated field,
Meet the qualifying criteria to receive the bonus,
Start betting.

How can new customers of PointsBet receive up to $100 money back? It’s easy.

There are certain terms and conditions that can affect their ability to redeem the PointsBet promo code and unlock this offer:

Become a PointsBet customer,
The PointsBet promo code is available to residents of Queensland, Victoria, The Northern Territory and Tasmania; so not available to players in Sothern Australia, New South Wales or Western Australia,
Players aged 18+ only,
1x wagering requirement on odds of more than $1.50,
Deposit must be made via credit card to be valid,
Deposit bonus may be used as a single bet on eligible fixed odds markets.

What are the PointsBet betting markets?
PoinsBet is one of the main operators that put at players’ disposal a wide range of spread betting markets, with over 300 NFL markets including approx. 100 that can’t be found at any other operator.

No matter which is your favourite sport, with the PointsBet promo code, you can place a bet on numerous events:

Football, motor sports, tennis,
Snooker, darts, MMA, boxing, ice hockey,
Baseball, AFL.
Both novice and professional players get a sense of what spread betting is if they try out PointsBet’s different types of bets:

Time of markets (minutes or seconds for specific events; these can also be used as units for mutipliers) for NBA, AFL, League/Union, ice hockey and soccer,
Player stats across all major sports including NBA player shooting 2PT, 3P and FT percentages, player points, rebounds, assists,
Player fantasy points, totals and disposal totals for AFL,
Player try minutes for NRL and player strike rates for cricket,
Multiplier markets are offered to help customers get the maximum leverage possible on their bets. This option is available on a range of stats and points for major sports.
